attributes.action: The British Government to recognise the validity of the UK EU Referendum result
attributes.additional_details:
Would the Remain voters, that have signed the petition for a new EU Referendum, be in favour of the Leave Campaign demanding another referendum if they had won with the same percentage point lead?

No.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to recognise the validity of the UK EU Referendum result and not implement further referendums as requested in an earlier petition.
